Name: Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness
About the game: Features Drag your card to interact with the environment cards to complete each level. Collectible Item - along all the stage, player will have chances to retrieve items from character and understand more about them. Many different RPG card types to make various unique choice decisions. Many kawaii girls from different designs are waiting for you!! Various interactions follow up with the character. Cute voice with different personalities from every character. Gallery and character viewer features. Good luck and happy ending!!
